description: Pink Dawn Chitalpa (Chitalpa 'Pink Dawn) is an amazing plant species due to its unique attributes. As a hybrid of chilopsis and catalpa trees, it offers an array of magnificent characteristics including its distinctive pink flowers that peak during the heat of summer. Although it requires plenty of sunshine, it can withstand hotter climates as it is drought and salt tolerant. Its foliage turns yellow in the fall, easy to maintain it grows between 15-25 feet tall. A great accent plant and a visual delight, it makes a superb addition to any landscape.
